entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:03 AM MDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
